name: Polarity Break
description:
Prepare to bust some blocks in POLARITY BREAK! Ever play Tetris and want to take out some of your rage on that one misplaced block that you didn't rotate in time? Well now you can, shoot blocks to rack up your point total, if you hit the same colors you can get double the points! Watch out for grey blocks though, they'll jack you up :P

Note: I didn't mention this in the read me but this is a pretty early build of this, I definitely want to come back to this project at a later time and fully realize it but for right now, this is a rough idea of where I want to go with it.

Controls(Controller)

A = Shoot

Joystick/pad = Move

Right/Left Bumpers = Rotate Blocks

X/Square = Slow Time (just a press, not a hold)

Controls(Keyboard)

Space = Shoot

Arrow Keys/WASD = Move

C & B keys = Rotate Blocks counter clockwise and clockwise respectively

V key = Time slow

The Escape Key will close the application.
